definition[1]: a person or organization that sells something
example[0]: Most sellers use an estate agent to set a price and advertise the property.
example[1]: In the UK sellers of alcohol must be at least 18.
definition[2]: a product that sells well or badly
example[2]: The book is among the 10top sellers of all time.
example[3]: Frozen yoghurt has been a big seller over the past two years.
